entity

Class Movie

  • Object
    • Movie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Movie
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a movie Each movie is associated to one or many movie reviews.
    Since:
    2019-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS3_Group4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movie

        public Movie(String title,
             String showingStatus,
             LocalDate endOfShowingDate,
             String synopsis,
             String director,
             List<String> cast,
             boolean isBlockBuster,
             int ticketSales)
        Creates a movie with the given title, showing status, end of showing date, sypnosis, director, casts and the determinant for blockbuster.
        Parameters:
        title - This movie's title
        showingStatus - This movie's showing status
        endOfShowingDate - This movie's end of showing date
        synopsis - This movie's synopsis
        director - This movie's director
        cast - This movie's casts
        isBlockBuster - This movie's determinant for blockbuster
        ticketSales - This movie's ticket sales
